prompt:
Best time to book EWR→AUA within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "EWR",
  "destination": "AUA",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 350,
  "fare_high_usd": 600,
  "notes": "Booking 3-6 weeks in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak travel times, such as holidays and school breaks, can increase fares significantly. Basic economy fares usually include one personal item but charge for carry-on and checked bags. For example, fares around $400 can be found if booked 30 days in advance, while last-minute bookings may exceed $600."
}
